content: to the first single_crochet with a slip_stitch 24 now you are going to add the mouth yellow running st marker 4 16 chain 1 place the mouth inside the head with the right side pointing away from you insert your hook into the next st of the head and any st of round 4 of the mouth and make a single_crochet through both layers make 23 more single_crochet s working into every st and through both layers see photos below don t join just continue around in a spiral 24 17 skip the initial chain st of round 16 *single_crochet increase 3 x single_crochet* x 6 30 18 *single_crochet increase 2 x single_crochet* x 10 40 round 16 this is what your work should look like from the bottom work turned for illustration only now you are going to work the tentacles or maybe have a glass of wine first 19 *slip_stitch in the next 2 st s and chain 31 slip_stitch in the top loop only of the second chain from the hook and the next 6 chain s single_crochet in the next 8 chain s and then half_double_crochet in the next 15 chain s skip the next st of round 18 and slip_stitch in the next 2 st s* x 8 please note there are 2 slip_stitch s before every tentacle and 2 after add the skipped stitch and that makes 5 st s of round 18 used per tentacle you are going to be very annoyed if you get to the last tentacle and realize you ve missed a few of these st s so count carefully trust me it s a pain to undo all the tentacles at this stage 20 please note you will be working over the slip_stitch s from round 19 and into the st s below them round 18 as it is difficult if not impossible to get into the slip_stitch s so with that in mind slip_stitch over the first slip_stitch of round 19 and into the st below it round 18 skip the next slip_stitch *30 x single_crochet into both remaining loops of the chain st s down the tentacle photos 1 and 2 below chain 6 photo 3 slip_stitch in the 2nd st from the hook and the next 2 chain s single_crochet in the next chain st and half_double_crochet in the last chain st photo 4 30 x single_crochet up the tentacle photos 5 and 6 single_crochet into the next 3 st s of round 18 and skip the next st of round 18 photos 7 and 8 * x 8 when you have finished making all 8 tentacles slip_stitch in the first st of the side of the first tentacle chain 1 and bind off you will notice that the tentacles have a natural tendency to curl photo 9 1 2 3 4 5 6 8 9 7 10 you can add the eyes at this point but it is much easier to place them accurately once
